# Min Int16

> Minimum signed 16-bit integer.

<!-- <usage> -->

## Usage

``` javascript
var INT16_MIN = require( '@stdlib/math/constants/int16-min' );
```

#### INT16_MIN

Minimum signed 16-bit integer.

``` javascript
INT16_MIN === -32768;
```

<!-- </usage> -->


<!-- <examples> -->

## Examples

<!-- TODO: better example -->

``` javascript
var INT16_MIN = require( '@stdlib/math/constants/int16-min' );

console.log( INT16_MIN );
// => -32768
```

<!-- </examples> -->
